trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted> event when a Delete button in the control is clicked or the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A> method is called, but after the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control deletes the item.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollere hever den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted>-hendelse når en Slett-knapp i kontrollen klikkes eller <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A>-metoden, men når den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontrollen lastes.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DeleteItem%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemDeleted> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: (A Delete button is a button whose `CommandName` property is set to "Delete".) This enables you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine whenever this event occurs, such as checking the results of a delete operation.
trans-unit.target: (En Delete-knappen er en knapp der `CommandName` er satt til "Delete".) Dette gjør at du må oppgi en hendelseshåndtering metode som utfører en egendefinert rutine når denne hendelsen oppstår, for eksempel kontrollere resultatet av en sletting.

trans-unit.source: A ListViewDeletedEventArgs object is passed to the event-handling method.
trans-unit.target: En ListViewDeletedEventArgs-objekt er sendt til hendelseshåndtering metoden.

trans-unit.source: This object enables you to determine the number of items affected and any exceptions that might have occurred.
trans-unit.target: Dette objektet, kan du finne ut hvor mange elementer berørt og eventuelle unntak som kan ha oppstått.

trans-unit.source: To determine the number of items that were affected by the delete operation, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil finne ut hvor mange elementer som er berørt av sletteoperasjonen, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: To determine whether any exceptions occurred, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå om unntak oppstod i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can indicate whether you have handled the exception in the event-handling method by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi om du har behandlet unntak i hendelseshåndtering metoden ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an exception occurs during the delete operation and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control re-throws the exception.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis det oppstår et unntak under sletteoperasjonen og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>er satt til `false`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll på nytt oppstår unntaket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: To access the key fields of the deleted item, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: For å få tilgang til nøkkelfeltene for slettet elementet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: To access non-key fields of the deleted item, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke er en nøkkel feltene i slettet elementet, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of the ListViewDeletedEventArgs class, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av klassen ListViewDeletedEventArgs, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: You can use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Du kan bruke denne konstruktøren for å initialisere en ny forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This constructor is primarily used by control developers when they raise events.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Denne konstruktøren brukes hovedsakelig av kontrollutviklere når de heve hendelser.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows initial property values for an instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs> class.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdier for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs>klassen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>|The value of the `affectedRows` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>|The value of the `e` parameter.| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>|`false`.|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>| Verdien for den `affectedRows` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>| Verdien for den `e` parameteren. | | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>| `false`.|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.AffectedRows%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of rows that were affected by the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som er berørt av sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: The exception that was raised when the delete operation was performed, if any.
trans-unit.target: Unntaket oppstod under sletteoperasjonen ble utført, hvis noen.

trans-unit.source: If no exception was raised, use <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen unntak oppstod, bruker du <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of rows that were affected by the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter antall rader som er berørt av sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Use the AffectedRows property to determine the number of items that were affected by the delete operation, as reported by the data source control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk AffectedRows-egenskapen til å bestemme antall elementer som er berørt av sletteoperasjonen, som rapporteres av datakildekontrollen.

trans-unit.source: This property is typically used to determine whether the correct number of items were deleted in the following ways: - To verify that only a single item was deleted.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes vanligvis til å fastsette om riktig antall elementer som ble slettet i følgende: – å bekrefte at bare ett element ble slettet.

trans-unit.source: Sometimes an incorrectly written delete statement can delete multiple items.
trans-unit.target: Noen ganger kan en skrevet feil delete-setning slette flere elementer.

trans-unit.source: - To verify that an item was deleted if an error occurs during the delete operation but no exception was raised.
trans-unit.target: -For å kontrollere at et element ble slettet hvis det oppstår en feil under sletteoperasjonen, men ingen unntak oppstod.

trans-unit.source: - To verify that an item was deleted when a data source control that supports optimistic concurrency (such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> controls) has its <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> property set to the `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: -For å bekrefte at et element ble slettet når en kilde-kontroll for data som støtter Optimistisk samtidighet (slik som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>Kontroller) er den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A>-egenskapen satt til den `ConflictOptions.CompareAllValues` opplistingsverdien.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.ConflictDetection%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Under this setting, an item that has been modified by another user might not be deleted.
trans-unit.target: Et element som har blitt endret av en annen bruker kan ikke slettes under denne innstillingen.

trans-unit.source: The number of rows that were affected by the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Antall rader som er berørt av sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Gets the exception, if any, that was raised during the delete operation.
trans-unit.target: Henter unntaket som oppstod under sletteoperasjonen.

trans-unit.source: Use the Exception property to get the exception that was raised during the delete operation, if any.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen unntak for å få unntak oppstod under sletteoperasjonen, hvis noen.

trans-unit.source: If no exceptions were raised, this property returns `null`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ingen unntak oppstod, denne egenskapen returnerer `null`.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If an exception was raised and you handle the exception in the event handler, set the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis det oppstod et unntak, og du unntaket i tilfelle behandlingsprogram, angitt i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.ExceptionHandled%2A>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control re-throws the exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis ikke, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll på nytt oppstår unntaket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: The exception that was raised during the delete operation, if any; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Unntak oppstod under sletteoperasjonen, eventuell; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether an exception that was raised during the delete operation was handled in the event handler.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om et unntak som oppstod under sletteoperasjonen ble behandlet i behandlingsprogram.

trans-unit.source: When an exception is raised during the delete operation, use the ExceptionHandled property to indicate whether you handled the exception during the event.
trans-unit.target: Når det oppstår et unntak under sletteoperasjonen, kan du bruke egenskapen ExceptionHandled som viser om du håndtert unntak under hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, the exception is considered handled and is not re-thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `true`, unntaket regnes håndtert og ikke er et på nytt.

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> control re-throws the exception.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `false`, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>kontroll på nytt oppstår unntaket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: To determine which exception was raised, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Bruk til å fastslå hvilke unntak oppstod i <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Exception%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the exception was handled in the event handler; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis unntaket ble behandlet i behandlingsprogrammet; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standardverdien er <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the key or keys for the deleted item.
trans-unit.target: Henter nøkkelen, eller nøkler for det slettede elementet.

trans-unit.source: Use the Keys property to access the values of the key fields (as specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property) for a deleted item.
trans-unit.target: Bruke egenskapen nøkler til å få tilgang til verdiene i nøkkelfeltene (som angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen) for et slettet element.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted items.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke disse verdiene for å loggføre Slettede elementer.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property contains only the key fields.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Inneholder bare nøkkelfeltene for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: To access the non-key fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til feltene ikke er en nøkkel, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Values%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Keys property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen nøkler returnerer et objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects that represent the key fields of the deleted item.
trans-unit.target: Objektet inneholder <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>objekter som representerer nøkkelfeltene for slettede elementet.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>

trans-unit.source: The key or keys for the deleted item.
trans-unit.target: Nøkkel eller nøkler for det slettede elementet.

trans-unit.source: Gets the non-key field values for the deleted item.
trans-unit.target: Henter feltverdiene ikke nøkkelen for det slettede elementet.

trans-unit.source: Use the Values property to access the values of the non-key fields for a deleted item.
trans-unit.target: Bruk egenskapen verdier til å få tilgang til verdiene i feltene ikke er en nøkkel for et slettet element.

trans-unit.source: For example, you can use these values to keep a log of deleted items.
trans-unit.target: Du kan for eksempel bruke disse verdiene for å loggføre Slettede elementer.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The Values property is populated only when two-way binding expressions are used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView> templates, such as the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A> template.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > For verdier er fylt ut bare ved bruk av toveis binding uttrykk i den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>maler, som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A>malen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.ItemTemplate%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView>

trans-unit.source: For more information about two-way binding expressions, see [Data-Binding Expression Syntax](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca).
trans-unit.target: Du finner mer informasjon om toveis binding uttrykk [syntaksen for databinding uttrykk](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/676beb1d-ddfa-4153-bba8-3c86dcb7ceca).

trans-unit.source: The Values property returns an object that implements the <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary> interface.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen verdier returnerer et objekt som implementerer den <xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>grensesnittet.</xref:System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary>

trans-unit.source: The object contains <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry> objects that represent the non-key fields of the deleted item.
trans-unit.target: Objektet inneholder <xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>objekter som representerer feltene ikke nøkkelen for det slettede elementet.</xref:System.Collections.DictionaryEntry>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This property does not contain the key fields (as specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property) for the deleted item.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Egenskapen inneholder ikke nøkkelfeltene (som angitt av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A?displayProperty=fullName>egenskapen) for det slettede elementet.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListView.DataKeyNames%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: To access the key fields, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha tilgang til nøkkelfeltene, kan du bruke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ListViewDeletedEventArgs.Keys%2A>

trans-unit.source: The non-key field values for the deleted item.
trans-unit.target: Ikke-nøkkelfelt verdier for det slettede elementet.
